BitStatus.Label: Secondary Current Limit
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a secondary current limit condition.

BitStatus.Label: Output Under Voltage
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a output over voltage condition.

BitStatus.Label: VX Over Voltage
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a VX node over voltage condition.

BitStatus.Label: VX Under Voltage
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a VX node under voltage condition.

BitStatus.Label: Disconnect Over Current
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a disconnect switch over current condition

BitStatus.Label: Thermal Shutdown
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a thermal shutdown condition.

BitStatus.Label: Soft Start Timeout
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag a soft start timeout condition.

BitStatus.Label: LED Short
BitStatus.Description: An LED SHORT condition was detected on one or more strings. Once set this bit will stay set until the STATUS2 register is read.

BitStatus.Label: LED Open
BitStatus.Description: An LED OPEN condition was detected on one or more strings. Once set this bit will stay set until the STATUS2 register is read.

BitStatus.Label: MTP Write
BitStatus.Description: Status bit to flag after user programming.

BitStatus.Label: Checksum
BitStatus.Description: Status bit indicating the register CHECKSUM is good.

List.Label: Voltage Ramp
List.Description: Voltage ramp generator ramp amplitude selection as a function of typical VOUT voltage.

List.Label: Fade Speed
List.Description: Set the fading counter from 50us to 12.75ms in 50us steps. This is the period between each intensity step.

List.Label: Maximum Current/String
List.Description: Program maximum current per string in 1mA steps.

List.Label: Hybrid Dimming Transition
List.Description: Transition point between PWM dimming and analog dimming.

List.Label: RC Filter
List.Description: Digital R-C Filter for non-DPWM mode brightness changes.

List.Label: PWM Filter
List.Description: Input PWM Filter for non-DPWM mode.

List.Label: LED Current Increase
List.Description: Sets percentage increase of LED full-scale current.

Slider.Label: LED Intensity
Slider.Description: Sets the LEDs intensity. Calculates brightness from 0% to 100%.

Bit.Name: SEL_VR2
Bit.Description: Voltage ramp generator ramp amplitude selection as a function of typical VOUT voltage

Bit.Name: SEL_VR1
Bit.Description: Voltage ramp generator ramp amplitude selection as a function of typical VOUT voltage

Bit.Name: SEL_VR0
Bit.Description: Voltage ramp generator ramp amplitude selection as a function of typical VOUT voltage

Bit.Name: CCM_Mode
Bit.Description: DCM fixed-frequency boost switching (no negative ILX) - 1: Forced CCM fixed-frequency boost switching (negative ILX allowed)

Bit.Name: VOUT_OVP_SEL3
Bit.Description: 4-bit selection of VOUT OVP thresholds from 19.375V (Fh) to 43.75V (0h default)

Bit.Name: VOUT_OVP_SEL2
Bit.Description: 4-bit selection of VOUT OVP thresholds from 19.375V (Fh) to 43.75V (0h default)

Bit.Name: VOUT_OVP_SEL1
Bit.Description: 4-bit selection of VOUT OVP thresholds from 19.375V (Fh) to 43.75V (0h default)

Bit.Name: VOUT_OVP_SEL0
Bit.Description: 4-bit selection of VOUT OVP thresholds from 19.375V (Fh) to 43.75V (0h default)

Bit.Name: IPEAK1
Bit.Description: IPEAK1:0 If OTP_FUNC_BOOST1 = 1 allows current mode control gain to be programmed If OTP_FUNC_BOOST1 = 0 current mode control is disabled

Bit.Name: IPEAK0
Bit.Description: IPEAK1:0 If OTP_FUNC_BOOST1 = 1 allows current mode control gain to be programmed If OTP_FUNC_BOOST1 = 0 current mode control is disabled

Bit.Name: PWM_IX1
Bit.Description: Transition point between analog dimming and PWM dimming during mode change

Bit.Name: PWM_IX0
Bit.Description: Transition point between analog dimming and PWM dimming during mode change

Bit.Name: RCFILTER1
Bit.Description: Enables or disables the filter level - See datasheet

Bit.Name: RCFILTER0
Bit.Description: Enables or disables the filter level - See datasheet

Bit.Name: PWMFILTER2
Bit.Description: Enables or disables the PWM input filter - See datasheet

Bit.Name: PWMFILTER1
Bit.Description: Enables or disables the PWM input filter - See datasheet

Bit.Name: PWMFILTER0
Bit.Description: Enables or disables the PWM input filter - See datasheet

Bit.Name: LEDVREGCNTINIT8
Bit.Description: Initial starting target voltage preset code (upper 4 bits only)

Bit.Name: LEDVREGCNTINIT7
Bit.Description: Initial starting target voltage preset code (upper 4 bits only)

Bit.Name: LEDVREGCNTINIT6
Bit.Description: Initial starting target voltage preset code (upper 4 bits only)

Bit.Name: LEDVREGCNTINIT5
Bit.Description: Initial starting target voltage preset code (upper 4 bits only)

Bit.Name: IMAXTUNE3
Bit.Description: Sets percentage increase of LED full-scale current in aprox 0.51% steps.

Bit.Name: IMAXTUNE2
Bit.Description: Sets percentage increase of LED full-scale current in aprox 0.51% steps.

Bit.Name: IMAXTUNE1
Bit.Description: Sets percentage increase of LED full-scale current in aprox 0.51% steps.

Bit.Name: IMAXTUNE0
Bit.Description: Sets percentage increase of LED full-scale current in aprox 0.51% steps.
